titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United Nations should forthwith take the procedural actions necessary to amend Article 23 of the Charter of the United Nations to remove the People's Republic of China as a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United Nations should forthwith take the procedural actions necessary to amend Article 23 of the Charter of the United Nations to remove the People's Republic of China as a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution states that the United Nations (UN) should amend the Charter of the United Nations to remove China as a permanent member of the UN Security Council.
